# Resources
# Business Data Science Basics Course
[The course](https://www.startupengineer.io/_repos/dat_sci_1/) offered by The Institute of Entrepreneurship, TUHH gives a very precise and detailed overview of all aspects of Business data science basics.


## R and R-Studio

[R](http://www.r-project.org) is a free open-source programming language that can be used for statistical analysis, data-simulation, graphing, and lots of other stuff. Another free program is [R-studio](http://www.rstudio.com), that provides a nice graphic interface for R. Download R first, then download R-studio. Both can run on PCs, Macs or Linux[]().
